normalised: Here's the normalized version of your Quora post:

unnormalised: **What are some reliable ways to find builder reviews in India, especially for projects in Mumbai?**
normalised: **What are some reliable ways to find builder reviews in India, especially for projects in Mumbai?**

unnormalised: So, I'm finally taking the plunge and looking to buy a flat in Mumbai. With so many builders out there, it’s honestly overwhelming! I'm really keen on reading some authentic builder reviews before shortlisting anyone. Been burnt before by fancy brochures, if you know what I mean.
normalised: So, I'm finally taking the plunge and looking to buy a flat in Mumbai. With so many builders out there, it's honestly overwhelming! I'm really keen on reading some authentic builder reviews before shortlisting anyone. Been burnt before by fancy brochures, if you know what I mean.

unnormalised: Besides just Googling "builder X review", what are some other reliable sources for Indian builder reviews? I'm particularly interested in projects in Andheri and around Powai. Are there any websites specifically dedicated to Indian real estate with genuine feedback? Maybe something like what happens with Amazon reviews but for flats?
normalised: Besides just Googling "builder X review", what are some other reliable sources for Indian builder reviews? I'm particularly interested in projects in Andheri and around Powai. Are there any websites specifically dedicated to Indian real estate with genuine feedback? Maybe something like what happens with Amazon reviews but for flats?

unnormalised: Also, has anyone here had experience with projects by Godrej Properties or the Lodha Group? I'd love to hear any firsthand accounts, good or bad. Things like timely possession, quality of construction, hidden costs, and how responsive they were post-possession (e.g., fixing leaks, addressing electrical issues). Planning to visit their site offices on 26/01/2024 but want to be prepared.
normalised: Also, has anyone here had experience with projects by Godrej Properties or the Lodha Group? I'd love to hear any firsthand accounts, good or bad. Things like timely possession, quality of construction, hidden costs, and how responsive they were post-possession (for example, fixing leaks, addressing electrical issues). Planning to visit their site offices on twenty sixth January two thousand and twenty four but want to be prepared.

unnormalised: Any insights from people who've recently bought properties (say, within the last 2 years) would be especially helpful. Also, what's a reasonable expectation for RERA compliance nowadays? My cousin bought a flat back in 2018 and it was a total mess, with delays pushing possession back by over 18 months! He finally got possession at 14:00 hrs on 10/03/2020 after a lot of struggle. Don't want that happening to me!
normalised: Any insights from people who've recently bought properties (say, within the last two years) would be especially helpful. Also, what's a reasonable expectation for R E R A compliance nowadays? My cousin bought a flat back in two thousand and eighteen and it was a total mess, with delays pushing possession back by over eighteen months! He finally got possession at two P M on tenth March two thousand and twenty after a lot of struggle. Don't want that happening to me!

unnormalised: Also, should I be looking at social media groups? If so, which ones are good for getting genuine reviews and not just marketing spiel? And are there any legal advisors who specialise in real estate deals and can give background checks on builders? I’m thinking of seeing Mr. Sharma, a lawyer my friend recommended; appointment at 11:00 hrs on 15/08/2023. Any suggestions are welcome! Thanks in advance!
